title: What will we want to wear next spring? We decode the spring-summer 2020 runway trends
text:
After four weeks, hundreds of shows and thousands of looks, fashion month is over for another season. For the industry, though, this is when the real work begins. Retailers must determine which looks they think we’re actually going to buy, manufacturers must begin producing those items en masse, and then brand marketing machines must work out how to promote and merchandise the new stock in a way that will convince us to spend our cash.

But what will those clothes look like? Which colours will we want to wear? And can we re-wear our Zara spotted dresses next summer too? Here we break down next season’s trends.

Draped crusaders
